value.scheme_objective: T The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate regular income through investment in a portfolio comprising of money market instruments with residual maturity up to 1 year. here is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
value.suitable_for_investors: • Regular income over short term • To generate income by investing in money market instruments *
value.type_of_scheme: An open ended debt scheme investing in money market instruments. A relatively low interest rate risk and moderate credit risk.
